feed.title: Coder Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.13.0
entry.content:
Changelog

[!NOTE] This is a mainline Coder release. We advise enterprise customers without a staging environment to install our latest stable release while we refine this version. Learn more about our Release Schedule.

BREAKING CHANGES

  • Remove deprecated agent v1 routes (#13486, dd243686e) (@ethanndickson)

    Breaks compatibility with older agents that don't use the V2 API.

  • Remove unused failing_sections endpoint from healthcheck (#13426, 54e8f3000) (@kylecarbs)
  • Add interface report to coder netcheck (#13562, fc09077b7) (@spikecurtis)

    Technically not backwards compatible when parsing coder netcheck output as JSON, since the original output is now under "derp" in the output.

Features

  • Block file transfers for security (#13501, e96652ebb) (@mtojek)

    Conditionally block file transfers via the Coder agent. terraform resource "docker_container" "workspace" { count = data.coder_workspace.me.start_count image = docker_image.main.name hostname = data.coder_workspace.me.name entrypoint = ["sh", "-c", replace(coder_agent.main.init_script, "/localhost|127\\.0\\.0\\.1/", "host.docker.internal")] env = [ "CODER_AGENT_TOKEN=${coder_agent.main.token}", ... "CODER_AGENT_BLOCK_FILE_TRANSFER=true", ] }

  • Add interfaces report to support bundle (#13563, 4b0b9b08d) (@spikecurtis)
  • Add NewTicker to clock testing library (#13593, 02ffff11d) (@spikecurtis)
  • Add cross-origin reporting for telemetry in the dashboard (#13612, 0793a4b35) (@kylecarbs)
  • Add Next() method to mock Clock (#13657, 46e1c36c4) (@spikecurtis)
  • Add docstrings to mock timer and ticker methods and structs (#13658, 9c1a6a29f) (@spikecurtis)
  • Add groups and group members to telemetry snapshot (#13655, 87ad560af) (@austinrhode)
  • Add "Full Name" field to user creation (#13659, 8a3592582) (@johnstcn)
  • Lint github actions workflows (#13552, d5d8b918d) (@dannykopping)
  • Expose workspace build ID to terraform-plugin-coder (#13680, c4f167605) (@mtojek)
  • CLI: Add json output to coder speedtest (#13475, a4bba520a) (@ethanndickson)
  • Server: Set full name from IDP name claim (#13468, 1131772e7) (@johnstcn)
  • Enterprise: Add auditing to SCIM (#13614, 889daf200) (@coadler)
  • Dashboard: Add deployment menu to navbar (#13401, 78b8264a9) (@aslilac)

    This moves all deployment-related dashboard tabs to the "Deployment" dropdown.

    Old navigation: New navigation:

  • Dashboard: Add download logs option to workspace page (#13466, 056a697ef) (@BrunoQuaresma)

    Users can now download logs directly in the workpsace UI:

Bug fixes

  • Correct swagger description for Insights API (#13442, bf98b0dfe) (@mtojek)
  • Fix build error background color (#13445, cb94dfb1f) (@aslilac)
  • Add missing route for codersdk.PostLogSource (#13421, 9d00a26a9) (@coadler)
  • Fix MeasureLatencyRecvTimeout to accept send=0 (#13477, fade8ba75) (@spikecurtis)
  • Replace invalid utf-8 sequences in agent logs (#13436, 7c081dcd6) (@kylecarbs)
  • Ignore yamux.ErrSessionShutdown on TestTailnetAPIConnector_Disconnects (#13532, 1f9bdc36b) (@spikecurtis)
  • Transform underscores to hyphens for Github login (#13384, c9cca9d56) (@kylecarbs)
  • Fix bad states in workspace actions options (#13572, 07cd9acb2) (@aslilac)
  • Allow mock clock Timers to accept negative duration (#13592, d0b2f6196) (@spikecurtis)
  • Write server config to telemetry (#13590, 3a1fa0459) (@kylecarbs)
  • Don't allow "new" or "create" as url-friendly names (#13596, e987ad1d8) (@aslilac)
  • Allow coder.com in CSP if telemetry is enabled (#13615, 57b38e5bb) (@kylecarbs)
  • API: Fill out zero-value user properties in /audit (#13604, 43e45f4ab) (@code-asher)
  • Track telemetry for login page correctly (#13618, 495eea452) (@kylecarbs)
  • Fix shallow clones not retrieving a valid semver (#13609, 714f2ef83) (@ethanndickson)
  • Fix workspacesdk to return error on API mismatch (#13683, 5b59f2880) (@spikecurtis)
  • Modify workspacesdk to ask for tailnet API 2.0 (#13684, c94b5188b) (@spikecurtis)
  • Improve checkbox text in template schedule settings dialog (#13669, 093ec3d05) (@jaaydenh)
  • Disable agent app buttons while a blocking startup script is running (#13667, 8b615f452) (@aslilac)
  • CLI: Inherit provisioner tags from last template version (#13462, cd32c4269) (@mtojek)
  • Server - UserOIDC: ignore leading @ of EmailDomain (#13568, fe240add8) (@johnstcn)
  • Dashboard: Fix tooltip in start button group (#13497, a8a81a61c) (@BrunoQuaresma)
  • Dashboard: Allow user to update their name (#13493, 1adc19b41) (@BrunoQuaresma)
  • Dashboard: Don't show start button while workspace is starting (#13495, c7e7312cb) (@coadler)

Changes to hidden experiments

These changes are hidden behind an unsafe experiment and will be made available in a future release. Follow progress in our issue tracker on Organizations + Custom Roles and Notifications. - Edit org display names and descriptions (#13474, 44a70a5bc) (@aslilac) - Allow editing org icon (#13547, 28228f1bc) (@aslilac) - Add CLI command to remove organization member (#13619, 75e7213ac) (@Emyrk) - Create database tables and queries for notifications (#13536, 0a221e8d5) (@dannykopping) - Dashboard: Add basic organization management UI (#13288, 8c1bd32c3) (@aslilac) - Remove assigning org-member role, this is implied from membership (#13578, 819bfd317) (@Emyrk) - Implement api layer for listing organization members (#13546, bbe23edc7) (@Emyrk) - Implement cli list organization members (#13555, d0fc81a51) (@Emyrk) - Implement assign organization roles from the cli (#13558, 7d51515f9) (@Emyrk) - Implement custom role assignment for organization admins (#13570, d04959cea) (@Emyrk) - Add organization member api + cli (#13577, 8e06ad46d) (@Emyrk) - Organization 404 write 1 http status (#13629, 5177f366f) (@Emyrk)

Documentation

  • Bump Kubernetes install version (#13487, e74358884) (@coadler)
  • FAQs: restrict file transfers from workspaces (#13534, 7958c5291) (@mtojek)
  • Add validated architecture (#13561, 87a172fb1) (@ericpaulsen)
  • Reorganize scaling docs (#13574, 87820a29d) (@ericpaulsen)
  • Add screenshots page under About (#13582, 808e1c0d8) (@bpmct)
  • Rename banners to announcement banners and show new usage (#13435, 213848e2e) (@stirby)

Code refactoring

  • Dashboard: Hide select helper when only one proxy exists (#13496, 4dfa90199) (@BrunoQuaresma)
  • Dashboard: Refactor filter search field (#13545, 0c627a4cb) (@BrunoQuaresma)

Chores

  • Return failed refresh errors on external auth as string (was boolean) (#13402, 24ba81930) (@Emyrk)
  • Add clock package for testing time (#13461, 42324b386) (@spikecurtis)
  • Move Batcher and Tracker to workspacestats (#13418, 5b9a65e5c) (@f0ssel)
  • Always use the latest released version tag when building (#13556, 1ca5dc032) (@kylecarbs)
  • Upgrade Go version to 1.22.4 (#13623, b4a5c7ffa) (@johnstcn)
  • Add SVG desktop icon (#13765, 84d992062) (@Parkreiner)

Other changes

  • manually updated autoversion (#13633, 2cfadad02) (@stirby)
  • Update docker-in-workspaces.md (#13606, a1ec8ad6e) (@mr-kelly)

Compare: v2.12.3...v2.13.0

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.13.0

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.12.4
entry.content:
Stable (since July 19, 2024)

Changelog

Changes

  • Dashboard: Allow dormant workspace to be deleted (#13850, 01b30ea) (@BrunoQuaresma)
  • Add SVG desktop icon for WebRDP module (#13765, 21a923a) (@Parkreiner)

Compare: v2.12.3...v2.12.4

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.12.4

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.13.1
entry.content:
Changelog

[!NOTE] This is a mainline Coder release. We advise enterprise customers without a staging environment to install our latest stable release while we refine this version. Learn more about our Release Schedule.

Bugfixes

  • Dashboard: Allow downloading partial logs for unhealthy workspaes (#13761, 940afa1) (@Parkreiner)
  • Dashboard: Allow dormant workspace to be deleted (#13850, 01b30ea) (@BrunoQuaresma)
  • Remove organizationIds from AuthProvider to resolve "missing organization ID" (#13917, 80cbffe) (@aslilac)

Compare: v2.13.0...v2.13.1

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.13.1

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.12.5
entry.content:
Stable (since July 22, 2024)

Changelog

Bugfixes

  • Keep active users active in scim (#13955, 03c5d42) (@Emyrk)

    Caused an issue preventing workspaces from autostarting until the owning user logged in.

Compare: v2.12.4...v2.12.5

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.12.5

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.13.2
entry.content:
Changelog

[!NOTE] This is a mainline Coder release. We advise enterprise customers without a staging environment to install our latest stable release while we refine this version. Learn more about our Release Schedule.

Bugfixes

  • Keep active users active in scim (#13955, 03c5d42) (@Emyrk)

    Caused an issue preventing workspaces from autostarting until the owning user logged in.

Compare: v2.13.1...v2.13.2

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.13.2

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.
